## mapObject() function

Maps the values of each of value to a new one synchronously

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mapObject<T, K>(obj: Record<string, T>, transform: (value: T, key: string) => K): Record<string, K>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | Record&lt;string, T&gt; | object of type Record<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->string, any<!-- -->&gt; to map |
|  transform | (value: T, key: string) =&gt; K | callback that returns the new value for each key/value pair |

<b>Returns:</b>

Record&lt;string, K&gt;

The new transformed object as a Record
